competitors.name: Amazon Redshift
competitors.notes: AWS's cloud data warehouse built on PostgreSQL, launched 2012

competitors.name: Google BigQuery
competitors.notes: Serverless data warehouse powered by Google's Dremel engine

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure SQL Data Warehouse
competitors.notes: Cloud data warehouse using MPP architecture

competitors.name: Oracle Exadata
competitors.notes: Enterprise database and data warehouse platform

competitors.name: IBM Db2
competitors.notes: Enterprise data warehouse with MPP architecture

competitors.name: Cloudera
competitors.notes: Hadoop-based big data platform for data warehousing

context: In 2015, Snowflake was still an early-stage company (founded 2012) competing against established cloud data warehouses like Amazon Redshift and Google BigQuery, along with traditional enterprise vendors like Teradata and Oracle. The Hadoop ecosystem was prominent for big data workloads.
